title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 that cover various aspects of causal inference in the context of machine learning (ML
container-title: and natural language processing (NLP), including general causality, causal discovery, and causal effects

title: Causal inference in statistics: An overview." *Statistics Surveys*. This article provides a comprehensive overview of causal inference techniques and their applications
Elements of Causal Inference: Foundations and Learning Algorithms
container-title: *MIT Press*. This book covers the foundations of causal inference and includes algorithms relevant to ML

title: Causation, Prediction, and Search
container-title: *MIT Press*. This book is a seminal work on causal discovery methods

title: Complete identification methods for the causal hierarchy
container-title: *Journal of Machine Learning Research*. This paper discusses methods for identifying causal effects

title: Causal inference and the data-fusion problem
container-title: *Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences*. This article explores the integration of data from multiple sources for causal inference

title: Causal effect inference with deep latent-variable models
note: This paper presents deep learning methods for causal effect inference.

title: The Sensitivity of Counterfactual Fairness to Unmeasured Confounding
container-title: *Proceedings of the Conference on Uncertainty in Artificial Intelligence (UAI)*. This paper addresses fairness in ML through the lens of causal inference

title: The Book of Why: The New Science of Cause and Effect
container-title: *Basic Books*. This book provides an accessible introduction to causal inference concepts

title: Multi-source domain adaptation: A causal view
container-title: *Proceedings of the Twenty-Ninth AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI)*. This paper discusses domain adaptation from a causal perspective

title: Causal inference by surrogate experiments: z-identifiability
container-title: *Proceedings of the Twenty-Ninth Conference on Uncertainty in Artificial Intelligence (UAI)*. This article introduces a method for causal inference using surrogate experiments

title: Causal inference using invariant prediction: identification and confidence intervals
container-title: *Journal of the Royal Statistical Society: Series B (Statistical Methodology)*
note: This paper presents methods for causal inference using invariant prediction.

title: Review of Causal Discovery Methods Based on Graphical Models." *Frontiers in Genetics*. This review covers various methods for causal discovery using graphical models
The seven tools of causal inference, with reflections on machine learning
container-title: *Communications of the ACM*. This article discusses tools for causal inference and their relevance to ML

title: Causality for Machine Learning
note: *arXiv preprint arXiv:1911.10500*. This paper explores the intersection of causality and ML.

title: Adapting Text Embeddings for Causal Inference
note: *arXiv preprint arXiv:2004.12014*. This paper discusses adapting text embeddings for causal inference in NLP.

title: Causal Inference in NLP: Estimation, Prediction, Interpretation and Beyond
container-title: *Proceedings of the 2021 Conference of the North American Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics: Human Language Technologies (NAACL-HLT)*. This paper reviews causal inference methods in NLP

title: Self-Critical Reasoning for Robust Visual Question Answering
container-title: *Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS)*. This paper integrates causal reasoning into visual question answering systems

title: The Blessings of Multiple Causes
container-title: *Journal of the American Statistical Association*. This paper discusses causal inference in the presence of multiple causes

title: Anchor regression: heterogeneous data meets causality
note: *arXiv preprint arXiv:1801.06229*. This paper introduces anchor regression for causal inference with heterogeneous data.

title: Causal Inference: What If
This book provides a comprehensive introduction to causal inference methods
These articles and books provide a solid foundation for understanding causal inference in ML and NLP, covering theoretical foundations, practical methods, and specific applications
